description.en: In course we use give an overview of concepts of policy values for discrete and continuous cash flows and the multiple state models. Emerging costs for traditional life insurance will also be discussed.
description.et: Kursusel antakse ülevaade pidevate rahavoogudega neto- ja brutoreservi arvutustest ning tutvustatakse mitme-seisundiga mudeleid (sealhulgas pensionikindlustus) kasutades stohhastilisi meetodeid.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to  give a generalized view to life insurance mathematics.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärgiks on anda ülevaade elukindlustuse kaasaegsetest matemaatilistest mudelitest.

learning_outcomes.et:
Aine läbinud üliõpilane
- Mõistab brutopreemiat ja preemia reserve.
- Teab ja oskab kirjeldada elukindlustuse mitme-seisundiga mudeleid.

description.et: Written closed-book exam. Up to 70 points.

grade_evaluation.et:
Test  gives you 30 points. Final exam gives you 70 points. The final score is the sum of the points, the final grade is determined as follows:
90-100 gives A,
80-89 gives B,
70-79 gives C,
60-69 gives D,
50-59 gives E,
49 or less gives F.
